mapper.sql: WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (MEMBERNUM, NOTICECHECK, TITLE, CONTENTS, REGDATE, FILEPATH, HIT) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{noticeCheck}, #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), #{filePath}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE NUM = #{num}
